snippet: A Pakistani court on Tuesday barred Pervez Musharraf, the country’s former military ruler, from running for public office for life.
abstract: Pakistani court bars former military ruler Pervez Musharraf from running for public office for life.
lead_paragraph: A Pakistani court on Tuesday barred Pervez Musharraf, the country’s former military ruler, from running for public office for life.

headline.main: Pakistan: Court Bars Musharraf From Office for Life
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Court Bars Musharraf From Office for Life
